property.description: Sets default sort order, required for sortheader component.
Sets column to be sort, required for sortheader component.

This attribute can be used to define the separate style classes for the each header of the each column.
The default would rendered as : Header1, Header2, .....
When true the table body will be scrollable with the headers still visiable. (Note: you will also need to set columnWidths, and scrollHeight)
Used in scrollable tables to define an absoule witdh for each colum. The width can be a percentage or a fixed pixal width. List values for each visiable column comma speerated. EG. 100px,200px,150px
Used in scrollable tables to define the displayed height of the table. Can be in pixels or percent. 200px or 50%.
